gateway AWS transit gateway allows
customers to essentially connect all of

and their on premise networks with
transit gateway customers can implement
policies on how their V pcs communicate
with each other and on how Vee pcs
communicate with their on-premise
networks some of the key features of
transit gateway are centralized routing
policies for V pcs and on-premise
networks you can choose to use a static
route table for all of your V pcs or
create custom route tables for all your
V pcs individually it scales to support
thousands of V pcs and if you have a
multi account structure you only need
one transit gateway to connect or
connect all of your V pcs you can
increase connectivity throughput with
your VPNs by adding a multi VPN
connection it allows you for flexible
segmentation and routing rules within
your V pcs it is horizontally scalable
and it has simplified management what
are the benefits of transit gateway the
first one being simplified networking
you can centrally interconnect multiple
V pcs across all of your accounts you
can also increase your VPN throughput by
using equal costs multipath routing
we've tested this up to 50 gigabytes per

for your VPN and coming very soon your

into your environment you only have to

to various V pcs within your environment
for each V PC we recommend using
multiple availability zones in case
there's ever an outage the transit
gateway will place an elastic network
interface in each individual

an AWS cloud map some of the key
features are service discovery
continuous integration and delivery as
well as automated health monitoring
let's dig into those a little bit deeper
with service discovery especially
surrounding micro services like

terminated it's hard to keep track of
all the connections between your
application with AWS cloud map that

before AWS cloud map you would have to

service discovery will find those

interested in a global low balanced

you can achieve automatic failover by
